summary: snuggling - cpt_winniethepooh - Captain America - All Media Types [Archive of Our Own]
title: snuggling - cpt_winniethepooh - Captain America - All Media Types [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Snuggling
Rating: General Audiences
Archive Warning: No Archive Warnings Apply
Categories: Gen, M/M
Fandoms: Captain America - All Media Types, The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Captain America (Movies)
Relationship: James “Bucky” Barnes/Steve Rogers
Characters: Steve Rogers, James “Bucky” Barnes, Tony Stark, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Bruce Banner, Thor (Marvel), Clint Barton, Pepper Potts, Lucky (Hawkeye)
Additional Tags: Post-Captain America: The Winter Soldier, Recovery, Avengers Family, Cuddling & Snuggling, Touch-Starved, Hurt/Comfort, Comfort, Bubble Bath, Sweaters, Movie Night, Baking, Dogs
Language: English
Chapters: 1/1
Summary:  There are certain things Steve misses from his good old days. One of them is Bucky, of course; another is how easily tactile people used to be with each other. Then he gets Bucky back, and the Avengers help him with his touch-starvation in their own way, too.
Written for the Happy Steve Bingo!

blog.name: mags-duranb
blog.title: microARTe
blog.description: I draw chibis and comics. Fairy Tail, Bleach and the Marvel Cinematic Universe. I am a sucker for crack pairings, sunken ships and Broships. Multishipper magnificent. Donations are Welcomed! https://ko-fi.com/magsduranb

summary: Tony x Pepper? And just in general, what ARE your biggest MCU OTPs?
question: Tony x Pepper? And just in general, what ARE your biggest MCU OTPs?
answer:
Hello!! :D

Well, not my OTP but still one of my favorite ships, because, they work despite Tony’s trainwreck personality, Pepper is steady and sane with the right amount of crazy to accept this human disaster onto her life and ground him. I like how they interact, she is brutally honest to him and he doesn’t hide who he is in front of her, they know who they are, and they complement each other pretty well, despite Tony’s shortcomings, he loves her dearly and is not ashamed to show it and Pepper, Pepper is a saint xD A great pairing :)

My biggest OTPs are het, mind you! hahahaha

Clintasha is my OTP of OTPs, don’t care what AoU says, MCU ClinTasha till the bitter end, and even as friends they still work way better that most of the so called romantic couples in the universe, sorry but they have one of the best dynamics ever. The loyalty, the love in whatever form they have it, their strenght the fact that they both come from the same ruthless world and still are able to find a bit of light for them and the care they felt for each other, they are always in the mind of the other. As far as I am concerned, they have a world on their own that no one can touch but them ;)

The ones following that I gonna mention are going in no particular order but what i am liking more at the moment, it varies depending what catches my interest because the MCU fandom is composed by its micro universes, so there.

RomanOgers: Yep, during the Winter Soldier movie they won me over, the reason I plunged into the MCU and their fics was because them, watched TWS, watched Age of Ultron and uuugh, i wanted to bleach my soul after that travesti i won’t mention. So Romanogers aka Cap Widow or SteveNat or wathever u want to call it. I loved, loved their dynamic during TWS, they were so natural around each other, there was tension, different points of view clashing but a great friendship in between and the potential to be a lot more, their relationship so honest, nothing forced, Nat shone there and Steve, oh Steve, he was such nice and steady contrast to her :3333

ThorJane: because it could be great if the directors weren’t so hellbent to shoehorning it into the movies instead of let it flow naturally, see where it went, as lovers or just as two unexpected beings becoming friends: crazy genius astrophysic fascinated by this alien guy who could talk in the same level as her and whom have answer to lots of her questions and this god and prince so taken with this tiny but brave and strong woman, so fearless and full of wonder for everything around her. I loved the Jane that Natalie portrayed but sadly the screenplay did not help her.

Stucky: Hey! lots of great fan writers doing a great job and Captain America movie writers too, that bromance is a romance in disguise! it’s so intense and tragic and gruesome but hopeful, the love and care is there, these two love each other in such a way, Steve literally turned the world upsided down and fought against it for this broken man who means the world to him  and that has been clawing his way back from the hell he was thrown into. And same guy is still there caring and helping and worrying because Steve is there taking in too much  again and for his sake, and aaaaw :´) They deserve all the happiness and a nice marriage, plz???


This is not romantic but I find Shuri and T’Challa relationship very compeling and natural, the way they are portrayed, the body language is so, so natural, realistic? Is awesome, they have the healthiets sibling relationship and despite Shuri teasing his brother endlessly, giving him shit left and right and making all the kingdom groan with her boldness, she loves T’Challa so much that when she sees him die, she literaly goes to pieces, yeah she does what she needs to do to help and save Wakanda but the lost of her older brother takes away all that happy personality with him. And T’Challa of course adores her in equal measure, the moment he sees Killmonger about to murder her, he brings out strenght to go and protect her, no one is gonna lay a hand on her baby sister in his watch, NO ONE >:(

I have guilty pleasures too and lots of brotps in the MCU and maybe other pairings but these are the more obvious and also I have a very soft, squishy spot for Sam Wilson *_*

summary: apparition
title: apparition
body:
“that pretty little thing could shatter your skull with her voice if someone decided to teach her how.”

prologue

She is only seven and yet her world comes crashing down at what she’s seen.From those youthful eyes, she’s watched conflicts arise and fade within the very confinements of the house she lived in. How…

Read more…

summary: HipZOMJoint NCBD Picks 10/31/18
title: HipZOMJoint NCBD Picks 10/31/18
body:
HipZOMJoint NCBD Picks 10/31/18

HAPPY NEW COMIC BOOK DAY BOYS AND GIRLS! LOTS OF NEW BOOKS ON THE SHELVES TODAY ALL OF WHICH CAN BE FOUND ON THE COMIXOLOGY APP AND AT YOUR LOCAL COMIC BOOK STORE!

AVENGERS HALLOWEEN SPECIAL #1

TRICK OR TREAT, TRUE BELIEVERS!

PLUS! Spooky stories starring the X-Men & Doctor Doom!

Epic thrills and ghastly horror awaits in these all-new twisted tales! Spanning the breadth of the Marvel Universe,…

View On WordPress

reblog.comment:
HipZOMJoint NCBD Picks 10/31/18

HAPPY NEW COMIC BOOK DAY BOYS AND GIRLS! LOTS OF NEW BOOKS ON THE SHELVES TODAY ALL OF WHICH CAN BE FOUND ON THE COMIXOLOGY APP AND AT YOUR LOCAL COMIC BOOK STORE!

summary: Like Autumn leaves, you’ll fall for us indeed! Come be part of the most luxurious residential building in Manhattan. Like leaves...
body:
Like Autumn leaves, you’ll fall for us indeed!

Come be part of the most luxurious residential building in Manhattan. Like leaves on a tree in Autumn, you’re guaranteed to fall for the apartments at Valhalla View! In Valhalla View residents not only get a cushy apartment and plenty of amenities but they also receive the company of their neighbors! Come be part of a community of extraordinary people and lease an apartment today.

Kosmopolites is a neighbor / city AU roleplay where your character is a resident of the Valhalla View building, an apartment building located in the heart of Manhattan. As a resident you will be able to form bonds with the other residents, pick up a job in the city, discover new things and create new adventures in the form of hangouts at the diner or lounge, romances or events in the building!

MAIN | PREMISE | RULES | APPLY | MASTERLIST (Mobile ver) | QUESTIONS

summary: The silver's tears
title: The silver's tears
body:
After New York battle time to go home, but would this be possible? Thor panicks as loki fell unconscious more paler and colder than ever if this was even possible fears of losing his brother again. Thor is protictive and the team start to ask questions and the truth needs to be told

I O U

Clint didn’t know whether to knock first or just open the door, Thor said he is asleep so no need to knock right! He turned on the light to see him curling on the bed shaking from the cold “This…

Read more…

blog.description: You have reached the tumblr of Tony Stark. After making Banner get a blog here I finally gave in and made a public one myself. Ask me things or just enjoy the show, choice is yours. I check the tag "sarcastictonystark" and you can @tag me Not currently accepting M!As Currently accepting compliments None of the images are mine, just the words between them. summary: If I see anyone running around in a Venom mask scaring children, I will end you.
body:
If I see anyone running around in a Venom mask scaring children, I will end you.

One, because you’re giving the gooboi a bad name. Two, because it’s wrong.

tags: reusing a shitpost cause dont nobody caaaaare
summary: avengers tower: october 31, 12:00 a.m.
body:
avengers tower: october 31, 12:00 a.m.

tony: HIT IT

tony: *starts blaring thriller by michael jackson, programs iron legion to do the choreo, and aggressively starts moonwalking*

steve, walking in tired: c’mon tony, we’ve been through this already, why the hell-

tony, turning and looking at him dead in the eye: IT’S CLOSE TO MIIIIIIIDNIGHT-

(orig.)
